bug.author: caisq
bug.summary: Newly added truncated_normal initializer is not supported in tfjs-layers
bug.description: TensorFlow version: latest tf-2.0 nightly When trying to load a model converted from tf-2.0-nightly-preview to tfjs_layers_model with the converter, the following error is thrown: 2019-03-27 12:14:43.255628: I tensorflow/compiler/xla/service/service.cc:158] StreamExecutor device (0): , (node:186998) UnhandledPromiseRejectionWarning: Error: truncatedNormal is not a valid Distribution. Valid values are normal,uniform or null/undefined.
